@HSBC_UK_Help Hi there, can you call me please? This is in regards to being sent someone else's card. My number is in the email I sent you.
@HSBC_UK_Help I'm glad you got the email. As I said in the email I am available 5pm UK time in Tuesday. I am away until Monday evening.
@HSBC_UK_Help I sent it right after you gave me the email ukhelp@hsbc.com. I've resent it now, as well as sent it from another account.
@HSBC_UK_Help OK thanks. I have sent you the information. Please let me know if you have gotten the email asap.
@HSBC_UK_Help Can you call me? I have called you twice already and it costs a lot of money. This is not my fault what has happened.
@HSBC_UK_Help Yes, I called last week. The Islington branch manager was suppose to mail it to me in Canada. He sent me the wrong card.
.@HSBC_UK I have been waiting a month for a bank card. One came in the mail today. You shipped me a card with SOMEONE ELSE'S NAME ON IT!!!
